title: Modelling and optimization of fenton process for decolorization of azo dye (DR16) at microreactor using artificial neural network and genetic algorithm
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Jafar Sadeghzadeh Ahari, Masoud Sadeghi, Mahdi Koolivand Salooki, Morteza Esfandyari, Masoud Rahimi, Sanaz Anahid
